justification: “Scene complexity reflected in local contrast distributions can be estimated … that outputs two parameters, contrast energy (CE) and spatial coherence (SC).”
“SC and CE together provide a compressed representation of scene complexity.”
“We investigated whether task-irrelevant manipulations of SC and CE interact with perceptual decision-making by using the drift-diffusion model (DDM).”
“We fitted a hierarchical version of the DDM (HDDM) using the RT distributions of correct and incorrect responses.”
